text: Motion

Sorry for calling the three of you here so suddenly
today. I have something very important to tell you.

Everyone,
I'd like to have you girls work as a unit from now on.
U-Unit activities, right...?

Wow! Does that mean the three of us
can be idols from now on!?
Yeah, that's what I meant.
Do you have a specific unit activity in mind?

First of all, I want you to work hard on your lessons
and auditions for your debut live performance.

I'm sure it will be a great experience.
What do you think, will you do it?

Of course! I'm counting on you, Producer!
Besides──

Ah, sorry! I haven't introduced myself!
I'm Meguru Hachimiya!

I'm a member of various clubs at my high school,
and I'd be happy to get to know both of you!

...Ehehe, I'll be in your care from now on!
Right, then it's both of your turn!
Motion

U-Uh, let's see, I'm Mano Sakuragi.
Nice to meet you...

For introduction... uh...
Um, I like to go on walks and sit under the sun...

Well, I'm just starting out as an idol, but I'll
do my best to keep up with everyone.
Motion

...Hiori Kazano,
nice to meet you.

I've been practicing to become an idol...
...I will continue to do so from now on.
...Because I want to be someone who can shine.

──Yeah.
I'll do my best with everyone here...!
M-Me too...

Thank you everyone. Now let me tell you the
name of the unit you're all in.

Mano, Hiori, Meguru...
The name of your unit is──
